channel.title: [508 Server] How Do I Change How Do I Change The NPCDialogue?
channel.description: I have a butterscape source and when I log in the server and talk to a npc it says welcome to butterscape, so how am i supose to change it, i tryed going to NPCDialogue.java and changing it there but nothing happen but when i change the classfile one whenever i talk to a npc i freeze

Oh sorry, didn’t read it clearly.

Npcoption1.java or NPCDialogue.java
